document_data.mainbody: ''''luzal unba''''' was a tradition of [[Sauk]]'s clan. In rememberance of a dead family member, a warrior opened a bleeding gash from the crown of their own head to their cheek, and let it heal.{{cite book/Sentinelspire||4}} [[Sauk]] opened one scar on his head in response to [[Kheil]]'s death; upon meeting [[Berun]], he opened a second one to remind himself that Kheil was truly dead.{{cite book/Sentinelspire||14}}
